"Chasing Waterfalls":
"Thank you so much for observing the heavy rain!
Yet, it seems on Wopal that, in addition to the normal
rainfall there is also an unusual rainfall phenomenon.
The more I hear the more excited I get!
However, I'm troubled because I still can't get a good
image of what kind of phenomenon this is
from the reports that I have now..."

"大雨の観察
どうもありがとうございました！
しかも惑星ウォパルには一般的な雨とは
異なった降水現象もあるそうですね。
聞けば聞くほど本当にワクワクします！
でも、それがどんな現象なのか
今ある報告書からは充分にイメージを
つかめなくて困っているんです……"
